backend/main.mo: Defines data models and access-controlled operations for user profiles, resumes, job postings, and applications in a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature definitions, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing between major views.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component with header, navigation tabs, and footer around the active view content.
frontend/src/components/ApplicationStatu: Displays application status using a styled badge mapped from status type.
Dialog for editing cover letters, managing submission checklists, and marking applications as applied.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication flow, showing a login screen or loading state before granting access to children.
frontend/src/components/CoverLetterEdito: Editor for viewing and saving the user's default cover letter template.
frontend/src/components/JobDetail.tsx: Displays details for a selected job with actions for applying, deleting, and viewing application status.
frontend/src/components/JobFormDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating a new job posting with validation and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/JobsFiltersBar.t: UI controls for filtering jobs by location and sorting by date or match score.
frontend/src/components/JobsList.tsx: Job list page with search, filtering, sorting, job selection, and add-job dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/LocationSettings: Form for editing and saving user location fields using resume profile hooks with validation and change tracking.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state with loading and error recovery.
Displays job match score from backend, showing loading, no match, or a styled badge based on score.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal for initial user profile creation, collecting name and optional email and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResumeEditor.tsx: Editor for resume text that loads, tracks changes, and saves resume content via resume profile API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor tied to Internet Identity with automatic refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth client, identity loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobApplications.ts: Hooks to fetch, create, update, and ensure job applications with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobMatchScore.ts: Fetches job match score for a job ID using the actor with conditional query execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostings.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and deleting job postings with backend actor integration and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumeProfile.ts: React-query hooks to fetch, save, and format the user's resume profile and location.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to load and update the authenticated user's profile with react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining state, features, and requirements for the job application app.
